name: Ms. Han's After-School Tutoring
description:
About the Game
Ms. Han is enthusiastic about teaching. She believes that she can motivate students as long as she listens to what they really want and communicate with them with patience. When invited by a parent one day, she agrees to be a tutor for a problematic student, who finds it difficult to adapt to his life on campus.
The game is conducted in the first-person voice in AVG mode with two-dimensional erotic anime. Virtual sex can be had using the A-GUI Joystick.
( You can also switch to mouse operation )
The A-GUI Joystick is an adult gamepad that can be connected to a computer for virtual sex with the female characters in the games.
（To purchase A-GUI joystick, please visit the website）
What’s special about the A-GUI Joystick

◆Equipped with a sensor that detects the direction and speed of masturbatory activity
◆Comes with a button for ejaculation that allows the product to identify the signal of inner or outer ejaculation
◆Compact size for easy storage: measures 170 mm in height, 80 mm in diameter and weighs only 350 grams
◆Easy assembly and use with removable sleeve
Silica Gel Sleeve Molded from Ms. Han
Ms. Han's silica gel sleeve gives you the pleasure of a mature woman's vulva, with a thick, pale and soft labia. The inner coiled pattern allows tender suction and just the right tightness during penetration without excessive stimulation. You are destined to enjoy a heavenly orgasm with Ms. Han.
